name: 5 Minute Dungeon
description:
5 Minute Dungeon was made for the Secret Santa 2020 game jam for angrihorse.

Travel through an endless maze in 5 minutes and see how many aprons you can get. How high a score can you get in one save?

Move with WASD/Arrow Keys, dash with Space, pause with Escape

Thanks to Austin Lytle for the 2 music tracks
